20110112140321.000|20110112140322.000|CC1|DROVE AWAY.

20110112140644.000|20110112140645.000|CC1|THE RECENT CRITICISM AGAINST    
20110112140645.000|20110112140650.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110112140650.000|20110112140652.000|CC1|>> ACTS OF MONSTROUS CRIMINALITY
20110112140652.000|20110112140654.000|CC1|STAND ON THEIR OWN.             
20110112140654.000|20110112140656.000|CC1|THEY BEGIN AND END WITH THE     
20110112140656.000|20110112140657.000|CC1|CRIMINALS WHO COMMIT THEM.      
20110112140657.000|20110112140659.000|CC1|NOT COLLECTIVELY, WITH ALL THE  
20110112140659.000|20110112140701.000|CC1|CITIZENS OF A STATE, NOT WITH   
20110112140701.000|20110112140703.000|CC1|THOSE WHO LISTEN TO TALK RADIO, 
20110112140703.000|20110112140705.000|CC1|NOT WITH MAPS OF SWING DISTRICTS
20110112140705.000|20110112140708.000|CC1|USED BY BOTH SIDES OF THE AISLE,
20110112140708.000|20110112140710.000|CC1|NOT WITH LAW-ABIDING CITIZENS   
20110112140710.000|20110112140711.000|CC1|WHO RESPECTFULLY EXERCISE THEIR 
20110112140711.000|20110112140713.000|CC1|FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHTS AT       
20110112140713.000|20110112140715.000|CC1|CAMPAIGN RALLIES, AND NOT WITH  
20110112140715.000|20110112140716.000|CC1|THOSE WHO PROUDLY VOTED IN THE  
20110112140716.000|20110112140717.000|CC1|LAST ELECTION.                  
20110112140717.000|20110112140719.000|CC1|IF YOU DON'T LIKE A PERSON'S    
20110112140719.000|20110112140720.000|CC1|VISION FOR THE COUNTRY, YOU'RE  
20110112140720.000|20110112140722.000|CC1|FREE TO DEBATE THAT VISION.     
20110112140722.000|20110112140724.000|CC1|IF YOU DON'T LIKE THEIR IDEAS,  
20110112140724.000|20110112140727.000|CC1|YOU'RE FREE TO PROPOSE BETTER   
20110112140727.000|20110112140727.000|CC1|IDEAS.

20110112140728.000|20110112140731.000|CC1|A TRAGEDY UNFOLDING, JOURNALISTS

20110112141544.000|20110112141545.000|CC1|BEHAVIOR WHO WAS GROWING

20110112141547.000|20110112141550.000|CC1|>> BUT LOUGHNER APPARENTLY NEVER
20110112141550.000|20110112141550.000|CC1|RECEIVED MENTAL HEALTH TREATMENT
20110112141550.000|20110112141551.000|CC1|AND WAS STILL ABLE TO BUY A GUN 
20110112141551.000|20110112141554.000|CC1|LAST FALL.                      
20110112141554.000|20110112141557.000|CC1|HAROLD KOPPELOWITZ IS A CHILD   
20110112141557.000|20110112141558.000|CC1|PSYCHIATRIST AND PRESIDENT OF   
20110112141558.000|20110112141600.000|CC1|THE CHILD MIND INSTITUTE.       
20110112141600.000|20110112141604.000|CC1|AND ERIN NELSON IS A FORENSIC   
20110112141604.000|20110112141605.000|CC1|AND PSYCHOLOGIST WHO HAS

20110112141608.000|20110112141610.000|CC1|COLUMBINE HIGH SCHOOL SHOOTING  
20110112141610.000|20110112141611.000|CC1|AND JOINS ME HERE IN TUCSON.    
20110112141611.000|20110112141613.000|CC1|I'LL START WITH YOU, DR. NELSON.
20110112141613.000|20110112141614.000|CC1|WHEN YOU LOOK AT SOME OF THE

20110112142234.000|20110112142237.000|CC1|STIGMA ON A MENTAL HEALTH ISSUE 
20110112142237.000|20110112142240.000|CC1|ALMOST, YOU KNOW, TRUMPS -- AND 
20110112142240.000|20110112142242.000|CC1|THE CIVIL LIBERTIES ALMOST      
20110112142242.000|20110112142243.000|CC1|TRUMPS THE HELP THAT GOVERNMENT 
20110112142243.000|20110112142245.000|CC1|CAN DO.                         
20110112142245.000|20110112142245.000|CC1|>> I THINK THAT'S THE IMPORTANT 
20110112142245.000|20110112142246.000|CC1|PIECE.                          
20110112142246.000|20110112142247.000|CC1|IF YOU THINK ABOUT THE FACT THAT
20110112142247.000|20110112142250.000|CC1|YOU ARE IN A SUBWAY AND YOU SAW 
20110112142250.000|20110112142253.000|CC1|A KID OR SAW A YOUNG PERSON
